group.cs242.beatblocks

Class BeatMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • group.cs242.beatblocks.BeatMap

  • public class BeatMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Cameron Icso Defines the specifications for the Beat Map displayed in game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Rect accepting_range
      an unmoving Rectangle that represents when a move can be made
      (package private) int beat_width
      The width of each of the beats
      (package private) Beat[] beats
      An array of the Beats that will be used
      (package private) Rect border
      an unmoving Rectangle that will create a border around the Beats and Accepting Range
      (package private) int bottom
      The bottom border of the Beats and Rectangles
      (package private) int duration_constant
      A constant for how long one beat will take to get from start to finish Also represents the amount of beats that will be created
      (package private) Handler handler
      Used to delay the start of the song
      (package private) int height
      The height of the view where the BeatMap will be displayed
      (package private) long milliseconds_per_beat
      The milliseconds per beat of the song, used for Animation of the beats
      (package private) java.lang.Runnable runner
      In charge of starting the song
      (package private) Song song
      The Song associated with the BeatMap
      (package private) int top
      The top border of the Beats and Rectangles
      (package private) int width
      The width of the view where the BeatMap will be displayed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeatMap(int w, int h)
      Constructor given a width and a height initializes the width, height, top, bottom, beat width, accepting range, and border

    • Method Summary

      Called in a constructor with a Song or the setUp(Song) method Creates the beats array and initializes each Beat

      (package private) void run()
      Runs the animation of all of the beats as well as playing the song

      • BeatMap

        BeatMap(int w,
        int h)
        Constructor given a width and a height initializes the width, height, top, bottom, beat width, accepting range, and border
        Parameters:
        w - - the width of the view
        h - - the height of the view

    • Method Detail

      • isGoodMove

        public boolean isGoodMove()
        Returns:
        If the part of a beat is in the accepting range and not used yet Will set the beat's used to true if that beat is used in the move

      • createBeats

        private void createBeats()
        Called in a constructor with a Song or the setUp(Song) method Creates the beats array and initializes each Beat

      • run

        void run()
        Runs the animation of all of the beats as well as playing the song

      • setUp

        void setUp()
        Updates the top, bottom, accepting range, border, and beats

      • setUp

        void setUp(Song sng)
        Parameters:
        sng - - the song to be used in the BeatMap Initializes the song, milliseconds per beat, and creates the beat array
